description: Unique identifier for this budget year record.
Numeric year that the budget applies to (e.g., 2025); likely fiscal year; confirm with SME.
Date the budget year becomes effective for planning, forecasting, and reporting.
Date after which the budget year is no longer effective.
Indicates the record is deprecated and should not be used in new processes.
User account that created this budget year record (audit trail).
Date and time the record was created.
User account that last modified this record.
Date and time of the most recent modification.
